question: {name} was preparing for a {event} at her house, where she intended to serve {food}. She noticed that she was out of plastic {obj}, so she bought a new package of {obj}. Later, her husband also bought a package of {n1} new {obj} and gave them to {name}. While {name} was making the {food}, she used {n2} of the {obj} to sample her {food}, then threw away {extra_count} defective {obj}. The guests also brought {extra} packs of {obj}, each having {extra_count} inside them. Later, when she went to set the table, she had a total of {total} {obj}. How many {obj} were in the package that {name} bought?
answer: total - n1 - extra * extra_count + n2 + extra_count
